definition: the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/gossip/gossipy
divinatory diagram/one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
eight trigrams furnace to cook pills of immortality/symbol of the alchemist's art/Double, double toil and trouble, Fire burn, and cauldron bubble

sentences.english: Ten nets are exquisite and regular, seemlingly having gained mercy of gods.
sentences.chinese: 網織的精巧而規矩，八卦形的張開，彷彿得到神主。

sentences.english: Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others.
sentences.chinese: 避免說反話或別人的八卦。

sentences.english: Ba Gua's basics are standing and walking in eight palace.
sentences.chinese: 八卦掌以站樁，行步爲基本功。

sentences.english: The homologous figures to postnatal Eight Trigrams can solve the contradiction .
sentences.chinese: 後天八卦的對應數字，就解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: It is one kind of traditional long weapon routines in Eight Diagrams School.
sentences.chinese: 八卦滾手刀是八卦掌門傳統長兵器套路之一。

sentences.english: It is one kind of traditional long weapon routines in Eight Diagrams School.
sentences.chinese: 八卦滾手刀是八卦掌門傳統長兵器套路之一。

sentences.english: The citys octagonal layout was modeled on the eight-diagram pattern.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市就是按照八卦的圖形修建的。

sentences.english: Missing Angle represents the meaning is in a position can't gossip corresponding to the room.
sentences.chinese: 缺角所代表的意思是八卦中的某方位無法對應到房間。

sentences.english: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉斯和蛇發女怪三姐妹在可怕的萬聖節前夕聊八卦。

sentences.english: Men are bigger gossips than women, according to new research。
sentences.chinese: 最新調查表明，男人比女人還八卦。

sentences.english: We went to Bagua Mountain first.
Muckraking journalists denounced the titans of American business as "robber barons".
sentences.chinese: 八卦記者曾將美國工商業巨頭直斥爲“強盜頭目”。

sentences.english: The bagua style refers to that in which all buildings surround the danlu, a stove to make elixirs.
sentences.chinese: 八卦型指的是圍着煉丹爐的所有建築物的佈局。

sentences.english: It is a pity because recently rumours that female the ghost begging meters of water, avoid gossip mirror hung the boss.
sentences.chinese: 可惜因爲近日盛傳女鬼乞米水，老闆掛着八卦鏡防避。

sentences.english: Zoe is our office's gossip queen.
sentences.chinese: 柔依是我們辦公室的八卦女王。

sentences.english: Instead of blabbering here why dont we people make our India far more better than China.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏八卦不然花時間把印度變得比中國更好。

definition: the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology
upright and honest/cheerful/to chat idly/to boast/to talk smoothly
to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
